医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿拉斯加北极熊体内检测到禽流感病毒研究人员报告称，阿拉斯加一只自由放养的幼年北极熊自然感染了高致病性甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒，这凸显了野生动物健康监测在检测新出现病原体方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Bird-flu-virus-Detected-in-Alaskan-tropic-bear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Bird-flu-virus-Detected-in-Alaskan-tropic-bear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1230c002-e921-4370-9197-0c1d2cad393f Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:42:00 -0400 Bird flu virus detected in Alaskan polar bear
是什么促使 Z 世代接受植物性饮食？一项针对希腊、印度和英国 Z 世代大学生的研究表明，态度、健康饮食知识、膳食准备参与和感知障碍显着影响他们采用植物性饮食的意愿，凸显了推广可持续食品的机遇和挑战选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/What-drives-Gen-Z-to-embrace-plant-based-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/What-drives-Gen-Z-to-embrace-plant-based-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48ef6b65-716d-4f29-9b33-846eead3d81d Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:17:00 -0400 What drives Gen Z to embrace plant-based diets?
健康生活是最好的药物：研究将健康习惯与降低高血压患者死亡率联系起来研究人员发现，由 Life's Essential 8 (LE8) 定义的较高心血管健康评分与高血压患者较低的死亡风险相关。全面改变生活方式可以使高血压患者受益匪浅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Living-well-is-the-best-medicine-Study-links-healthy-habits-to-lower-mortality-in-hypertential-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Living-well-is-the-best-medicine-Study-links-healthy-habits-to-lower-mortality-in-hypertential-individuals.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce7eb825-d64e-4a8f-af22-64fe6a3d4995 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Living well is the best medicine: Study links healthy habits to lower mortality in hypertensive individuals
没有一个器官是一座孤岛：基因研究显示独特但相互关联的衰老标记研究人员使用英国生物银行的大型数据集分析了九个器官系统中生物年龄差距的遗传基础，揭示了器官特异性但相互关联的遗传结构。他们的发现可能有助于了解复杂的疾病和开发整体治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/No-organ-is-an-island-Genetic-study-shows-unique-but-interconnected-aging-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/No-organ-is-an-island-Genetic-study-shows-unique-but-interconnected-aging-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee593cb-6218-4d28-8dda-57b4e3e3fefd Tue, 02 Jul 2024 00:40:00 -0400 No organ is an island: Genetic study shows unique but interconnected aging markers
实施以患者为中心的姑息治疗可能有助于改善心脏病患者的生活质量根据美国《心血管疾病姑息药物治疗》的一项新科学声明，实施以患者为中心的姑息治疗，包括根据需要开药、调整或停止用药，可能有助于控制心脏病患者的症状并改善生活质量。心脏协会，今天发表在协会的期刊《循环：心血管质量和结果》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Implementing-eptic-centered-palliative-care-may-help-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Implementing- Patient-centered-palliative-care-may-help-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-heart-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb661d25-b45e-4d91-99ef-54546a539d54 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Implementing patient-centered palliative care may help improve quality of life for people with heart disease
研究人员确定了关键的骨质疏松症相关基因并开发了该疾病的新小鼠模型骨质疏松症——骨骼随着年龄的增长而减弱——影响着全世界数百万人，而且随着全球人口老龄化，这个数字每年都在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-identify-key-osteoporosis-lated-gene-and-develop-new-mouse-model-of-the-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-identify-key-osteoporosis-lated-gene-and-develop-new-mouse-model-of-the-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=920b5d2b-9512-4811-b864-34f986b0c93c Mon, 01 Jul 2024 23:05:26 -0400 Researchers identify key osteoporosis-related gene and develop new mouse model of the disease
研究人员发现特定蛋白质在狼疮发展中的作用浦项科技大学（POSTECH）生命科学系的 Yoontae Lee 教授和博士研究生 Jiho Park 组成的研究小组最近发现，一种特殊的蛋白质可以促进系统性红斑狼疮（SLE）的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-discover-role-of-pspecial- Protein-in-the-development-of-lupus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-discover-role-of-pspecial- Protein-in-the-development-of-lupus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5aff7ad8-63d5-4884-a64e-0b07f14ca5cf Mon, 01 Jul 2024 22:59:38 -0400 Researchers discover role of particular protein in the development of lupus
对广谱抗生素征税可能是对抗抗生素耐药性的一种策略东安格利亚大学竞争政策中心、拉夫堡大学和 E.CA Economics 的一项新研究表明，对某些抗生素征税可能有助于应对人类不断升级的抗生素耐药性威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Taxing-broad-spectrum-antibiotics-could-be-a-strategy-to-combat-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Taxing-broad-spectrum-antibiotics-could-be-a-strategy-to-combat-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a12d1c75-3816-4369-9b0a-b7f20fc5dda9 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 22:40:43 -0400 Taxing broad-spectrum antibiotics could be a strategy to combat antibiotic resistance
首次全球估计生殖器疱疹感染的经济成本根据对生殖器疱疹感染及其相关并发症的首次全球经济成本估计，生殖器疱疹感染及其相关并发症导致全球数十亿美元的医疗保健支出和生产力损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/First-global-estimates-of-economic-costs-of-genital-herpes-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/First-global-estimates-of-economic-costs-of-genital-herpes-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89ff4450-dc3e-4562-9cc1-b51e62f42d01 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 22:33:18 -0400 First global estimates of economic costs of genital herpes infections
青年和中年饮食质量与晚年更好的大脑健康有关一项研究的最新初步结果显示，在青年和中年时吃高质量的饮食有助于在老年时保持大脑的良好运作，该研究使用了近七年跟踪的 3,000 多人收集的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Youth-and-midlife-diet-quality-linked-to-better-brain-health-in-later-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Youth-and-midlife-diet-quality-linked-to-better-brain-health-in-later-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=490aa7b9-4201-42ba-9df8-638b3603854e Mon, 01 Jul 2024 22:25:50 -0400 Youth and midlife diet quality linked to better brain health in later years
